subcategories.name: The servant is dependent on his lord

duas.title: We Are in Need of Allah’s Help (Surah Al-Fatir)
duas.translation: All human beings depend on Allah for their welfare and prevention of evil in various matters of their religion and world. Allah says (interpretation of the meaning): O mankind, you are those in need of Allah, while Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy.

duas.title: Dua After Prayer for Rizq and Help
duas.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ، اَللَّهُمَّ لَا مَانِعَ لِمَا أَعْطَيْتَ وَلَا مُعْطِيَ لِمَا مَنَعْتَ وَلَا يَنْفَعُ ذَا الْجَدِّ مِنْكَ الْجَدُّ
duas.transliteration: Laa ilaaha illallahu wahdahu laa sharika lahu, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu wa huwa 'alaa kulli shay'in qadir. Allaahumma laa maani'a limaa a'taita wa laa mu'tia limaa mana'ta wa laa yanfa'u dhal-jaddi minka al-jaddu
duas.translation: There is none worthy of worship except Allah alone with no partner or associate. He is the Dominion and to Him be all praise, and He is able to do all things. O Allah, one can withhold what You have given and none can give what You have withheld, and no wealth or fortune can benefit anyone for from You comes all wealth and fortune.

duas.title: Power of La Ilaha Illallah (Freeing of slave)
duas.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ، وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ، وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
duas.transliteration: Laa ilahaa illAllahu wahdahu laa sharika lahu, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu wa huwa 'alaa kulli shay'in qadir
duas.translation: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. His is the dominion and His is the praise, and He is Able to do all things.

subcategories.name: The most important thing to ask Allah for

duas.title: The Most Important Thing to Ask Allah For
duas.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
duas.transliteration: Alhamdu lillahi rabbil 'aalameen
duas.translation: All praise is due to Allah, Lord of the worlds.

duas.title: Ask Allah for Guidance
duas.arabic: اهْدِنَا الصِّرَاطَ الْمُسْتَقِيمَ
duas.transliteration: Ihdinas-siraatal-mustaqeem
duas.translation: Guide us to the straight path.

duas.title: Dua for Forgiveness and Mercy
duas.arabic: رَبَّنَا اغْفِرْ لَنَا وَلِإِخْوَانِنَا الَّذِينَ سَبَقُونَا بِالْإِيمَانِ
duas.transliteration: Rabbanagh fir lanaa wa li-ikhwaaninal-ladheena sabaqoonaa bil-eemaan
duas.translation: Our Lord, forgive us and our brothers who preceded us in faith.

subcategories.name: Ask for paradise & protection from fire

duas.title: Dua for Paradise
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْجَنَّةَ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ النَّارِ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma innee as-alukal-jannata wa a'oodhu bika minan-naar
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for Paradise and I seek refuge in You from the Fire.

duas.title: Protection from Hellfire
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَجِرْنِي مِنَ النَّارِ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma ajirnee minan-naar
duas.translation: O Allah, protect me from the Fire.

duas.title: Dua for Salvation from Fire
duas.arabic: رَبَّنَا أَتْمِمْ لَنَا نُورَنَا وَاغْفِرْ لَنَا إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
duas.transliteration: Rabbanaa atmim lanaa nooranaa waghfir lanaa innaka 'alaa kulli shay'in qadeer
duas.translation: Our Lord, perfect for us our light and forgive us. Indeed, You are over all things competent.

subcategories.name: Dua to remain steadfast on the religion

duas.title: Dua for Steadfastness
duas.arabic: يَا مُقَلِّبَ الْقُلُوبِ ثَبِّتْ قَلْبِي عَلَى دِينِكَ
duas.transliteration: Yaa muqallibal quloob thabbit qalbee 'alaa deenik
duas.translation: O Turner of the hearts, make my heart steadfast upon Your religion.

duas.title: Dua for Firmness
duas.arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا
duas.transliteration: Rabbanaa laa tuzigh quloobanaa ba'da idh hadaytanaa
duas.translation: Our Lord, do not let our hearts deviate after You have guided us.

duas.title: Dua for Steadfast Faith
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ يَا مُثَبِّتَ الْقُلُوبِ ثَبِّتْنِي عَلَى الْحَقِّ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma yaa muthabbit al-quloob thabbitnee 'alal-haqq
duas.translation: O Allah, O Establisher of hearts, establish me upon the truth.

subcategories.name: Dua of good outcome in all deeds

duas.title: Dua for Good in All Affairs
duas.arabic: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً
duas.transliteration: Rabbanaa aatinaa fid-dunyaa hasanatan wa fil-aakhirati hasanatan
duas.translation: Our Lord, give us in this world [that which is] good and in the Hereafter [that which is] good.

duas.title: Dua for Righteous Deeds
duas.arabic: رَبَّنَا وَاجْعَلْ أَعْمَالَنَا صَالِحَةً
duas.transliteration: Rabbanaa waj'al a'maalanaa saalihah
duas.translation: Our Lord, and make our deeds righteous.

duas.title: Dua for Acceptance of Deeds
duas.arabic: رَبَّنَا تَقَبَّلْ مِنَّا إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ
duas.transliteration: Rabbanaa taqabbal minnaa innaka antas-samee'ul-'aleem
duas.translation: Our Lord, accept [this] from us. Indeed You are the Hearing, the Knowing.

subcategories.name: Seeking whatever good Allah can bestow

duas.title: Dua for All Good
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ كُلِّ خَيْرٍ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma innee as-aluka min kulli khayr
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for all good.

duas.title: Seeking Good from Allah
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ خَيْرِ مَا سَأَلَكَ مِنْهُ عِبَادُكَ الصَّالِحُونَ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma innee as-aluka min khayri maa sa-alaka minhu 'ibaaduk as-saalihoon
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for the good that Your righteous servants ask of You.

duas.title: Dua for Comprehensive Good
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا مِنْ لَدُنْكَ رَحْمَةً
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma aatinaa fid-dunyaa min ladunka rahmatan
duas.translation: O Allah, give us from Yourself mercy in this world.

subcategories.name: Shelter from horror, misery, evil consequences and rejoicing of the enemy

duas.title: Dua for Shelter from Horror
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَعِذْنِي مِنْ فِتْنَةِ الْمَحْيَا وَالْمَمَاتِ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma a'idhnee min fitnatil-mahyaa wal-mamaat
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the trial of life and death.

duas.title: Protection from Misery
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma innee a'oodhu bika minal-hammi wal-hazani
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from worry and grief.

duas.title: Dua Against Enemy's Rejoicing
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ احْفَظْنِي مِنْ بَيْنِ يَدَيَّ وَمِنْ خَلْفِي وَعَنْ يَمِينِي وَعَنْ شِمَالِي وَمِنْ فَوْقِي وَأَعُوذُ بِعَظَمَتِكَ أَنْ أُغْتَالَ مِنْ تَحْتِي
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma ihfaznee min bayni yadayya wa min khalfee wa 'an yameenee wa 'an shimaalee wa min fawqee wa a'oodhu bi-'azamatika an ughtaala min tahtee
duas.translation: O Allah, protect me from in front of me and behind me, from my right and my left, and from above me, and I seek refuge in Your Greatness from being taken unaware from below me.

subcategories.name: Excellence of doing Tasbeeh, Tahmid, Tahlil, Takbeer

duas.title: Dua for Reward of Freeing Slaves (Masnun dua)
duas.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ، وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ، وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
duas.transliteration: Laa 'ilaaha 'illAllahu wahdahu laa shareeka lahu, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu wa Huwa 'alaa kulli shay'in Qadeer
duas.translation: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without any partner. To Him belong all sovereignty and praise and He is over all things omnipotent.

duas.title: Dua for Forgiveness of Sins
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ
duas.transliteration: SubhaanAllahi wa bihamdihi
duas.translation: Glorified is Allah and praised is He.

duas.title: Dhikr for Forgiveness (Subhanallah Wa Bihamdihi Dua)
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ، سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ الْعَظِيمِ
duas.transliteration: SubhaanAllahi wa bihamdihi, Subhaanal-laahil-'Adheem
duas.translation: Glory be to Allah and all praise is due to him, glory be to Allah the great.

duas.title: Tasbeeh for Tree Shade on Judgment Day
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ
duas.transliteration: SubhaanAllahi wa bihamdihi
duas.translation: Glory be to Allah and praise be to Him. Whoever says this 100 times a day will have sins forgiven no matter how great, and will be given the reward of freeing ten slaves.

duas.title: Tahmid for Scales on Judgment Day
duas.arabic: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ
duas.transliteration: Astaghfirullaah
duas.translation: I seek forgiveness from Allah. (Said 100 times, it fills half the scales of good deeds).

duas.title: Tahlil for Sins Forgiven
duas.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ
duas.transliteration: Laa ilaaha illAllaah
duas.translation: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah. (Removes sins like foam of the sea).

duas.title: Takbeer for Mountain Weight Reward
duas.arabic: اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ
duas.transliteration: Allaahu Akbar
duas.translation: Allah is the Greatest. (Reward equal to the weight of Uhud mountain).

duas.title: Combined Dhikr for Paradise Doors
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ، سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ الْعَظِيمِ
duas.transliteration: SubhaanAllahi wa bihamdihi, Subhaanal-laahil-'Adheem
duas.translation: Glory be to Allah and all praise is due to Him, glory be to Allah the Great. (Intercedes for forgiveness on Judgment Day).

duas.title: Dhikr for Sins Shed Like Leaves
duas.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ
duas.transliteration: Laa ilaaha illAllaahu wahdahu laa sharika lahu
duas.translation: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah alone, without any partner. (Sins forgiven even if equal to foam of the sea).

duas.title: Tasbeeh for 1000 Good Deeds
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ
duas.transliteration: SubhaanAllaah
duas.translation: Glory be to Allah. (100 times = 1000 good deeds, 1000 sins erased).

duas.title: Tahmid for Scales Filled
duas.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ
duas.transliteration: Alhamdulillaah
duas.translation: Praise be to Allah. (100 times = reward of 1000 camels in charity).

duas.title: Tahlil for House in Paradise
duas.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ
duas.transliteration: Laa ilaaha illAllaah
duas.translation: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah. (100 times = house in the highest Paradise).

duas.title: Takbeer for Elevated Status
duas.arabic: اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ
duas.transliteration: Allaahu Akbar
duas.translation: Allah is the Greatest. (100 times = elevated status on Judgment Day).

subcategories.name: Times and places when dua will be accepted

duas.title: Dua After Adhan that gets Accepted (Hadith)
duas.translation: A man said: O Messenger of Allah, the mu'adhdhins excel us. The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: Say (the same words) as they say, and when you come to the end, ask Allah for anything and that will be granted to you.

duas.title: Hadith on Dua After Adhan
duas.translation: Anas (RA) said, the Prophet (ﷺ) said, when the call to prayer (adhan) is given, the gates of heaven are opened and the dua is accepted.

duas.title: Benefit of Laylatul Qadr Surah
duas.arabic: إِنَّا أَنزَلْنَاهُ فِي لَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ ﴿١﴾ وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ ﴿٢﴾ لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ ﴿٣﴾ تَنَزَّلُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ وَالرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِمْ مِّنْ كُلِّ أَمْرٍ ﴿٤﴾ سَلَامٌ هِيَ حَتَّىٰ مَطْلَعِ الْفَجْرِ ﴿٥﴾
duas.transliteration: Innaa anzalnaahu fee laylati alqadri wamaa adraka maa laylati alqadri laylati alqadri khayrun min alf shahri tanazzalu almalaa'ikatu warroohu feehaa bi'idhni rabbihim min kulli amrin salaamun hiya hatta matla'i alfajri
duas.translation: (1) Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree. (2) And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree? (3) The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months. (4) The angels and the Spirit descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter. (5) Peace it is until the emergence of dawn.

duas.title: Dua During Last Third of Night
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّكَ أَفْطَرْتَ وَحْدَكَ لَا شَرِيكَ لَكَ لَكَ الْحَمْدُ وَالْمُلْكُ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma innaka af-tarta wahdaka laa shareeka laka lahul-hamdu wal-mulku
duas.translation: O Allah, You have broken the fast alone, with no partner; for You is the praise and the kingdom.

duas.title: Dua at Suhoor
duas.arabic: وَصَلِّ عَلَىٰ مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
duas.transliteration: Wa sallallaahu 'alaa Muhammadin wa 'alaa aali Muhammad
duas.translation: And send blessings upon Muhammad and the family of Muhammad.

duas.title: Dua When Rain Falls
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ صَيِّبْ عَلَيْنَا الْغَيْثَ وَانْفَعْنَا بِهِ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma sayyib 'alaynaa al-ghaytha wa anfa'nnaa bihi
duas.translation: O Allah, send down upon us rain and make it beneficial for us.

duas.title: Dua to Stop Rain
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ حَوَالَيْنَا وَلَا عَلَيْنَا
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma hawalaynaa wa laa 'alaynaa
duas.translation: O Allah, around us and not upon us.

duas.title: Dua Between Adhan and Iqamah
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ هَذِهِ الدَّعْوَةِ التَّامَّةِ وَالصَّلَاةِ الْقَائِمَةِ آتِ مُحَمَّدًا الْوَسِيلَةَ وَالْفَضِيلَةَ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma rabba haa-dhihid-da'watit-taammati was-salaatil-qaaimati, aati Muhammadanil-waseelata walfadheela
duas.translation: O Allah, Lord of this perfect call and established prayer. Grant Muhammad the intercession and the favor.

duas.title: Dua During Prostration
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ رَبِّيَ الْأَعْلَى
duas.transliteration: Subhaana rabbiyal-a'laa
duas.translation: Glory be to my Lord Most High.

duas.title: Dua at End of Prayer
duas.arabic: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ
duas.transliteration: Astaghfirullaah
duas.translation: I seek forgiveness from Allah.

duas.title: Dua While Standing in Arafah
duas.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ يُحْيِي وَيُمِيتُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
duas.transliteration: Laa ilaaha illAllaahu wahdahu laa sharika lahu, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu yuhyee wa yumeetu wa huwa 'alaa kulli shay'in qadeer
duas.translation: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise. He gives life and causes death and He is over all things competent.

duas.title: Dua During Hajj Tawaf
duas.arabic: لَبَّيْكَ اللَّهُمَّ لَبَّيْكَ
duas.transliteration: Labbayk Allaahumma labbayk
duas.translation: At Your service Allah, at Your service.

duas.title: Dua at Iftar
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي لَكَ صُمْتُ وَبِكَ آمَنْتُ وَعَلَيْكَ تَوَكَّلْتُ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma innee laka sumtu wa bika aamantu wa 'alayka tawakkaltu
duas.translation: O Allah, I fasted for You, and I believe in You, and I rely upon You.

duas.title: Dua for Rain During Drought
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اسْقِنَا غَيْثًا مُغِيثًا مَرِيئًا مَرِيًّا نَافِعًا غَيْرَ ضَارٍ عَازِرٍ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma asqinaa ghaythan mughithan mari'an mar'i'an naafi'an ghayra dhaarin 'aazir
duas.translation: O Allah, send down upon us rain that helps, abundant, beneficial, not harmful, not lasting.

duas.title: Dua in Sujood of Last Rak'ah
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي ذَنْبِي كُلَّهُ دُونَهُ وَبَعْدَهُ وَمَا عَمِلْتُ فِيهِ وَمَا أَخْفَيْتُ وَمَا أَنْتَ أَعْلَمُ بِهِ مِنِّي أَنْتَ الْمُقَدِّمُ وَأَنْتَ الْمُؤَخِّرُ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma ghfir lee dhanbee kullahu diqqahu wa 'amduhu wa awwalahu wa aakhirahu wa alaaniyatahu wa sirrahu wa maa 'alimtu wa maa lam a'lam. Antal-muqaddimu wa antal-mu'akhkhiru laa ilaaha illaa anta.
duas.translation: O Allah, forgive me all my sins, the small and the great, first and last, the open and the secret, what I know and what I do not know. You are the Advancer and the Delayer, there is no god but You.

duas.title: Dua During Tahajjud
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ لَكَ الْحَمْدُ أَنْتَ قَيَّامُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَنْ فِيهِنَّ بِقُدْرَتِكَ وَمَلَكُوتِكَ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma lakal-hamdu anta qayyoomus-samawaati wal-ardhi wa man feehinna bi-qudratika wa malakootik
duas.translation: O Allah, to You be praise, You are the Sustainer of the heavens and the earth and all that is in them by Your power and majesty.

duas.title: Dua at Friday Prayer
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِي يَوْمِنَا هَذَا
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma baarik lanaa fee yawmina haadhaa
duas.translation: O Allah, bless us in this our day.

duas.title: Dua During Eclipse
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّهُ مِنْ أَمْرِكَ مِنْ أَمْرِ سَمَاوَاتِكَ وَأَرْضِكَ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma innahu min amrika min amri samaawaatika wa ardika
duas.translation: O Allah, this is from Your command, from the matter of Your heavens and Your earth.

duas.title: Dua When Seeing Crescent Moon
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَهِلَّهُ عَلَيْنَا بِالْيُسْرِ وَالْإِيمَانِ وَالسَّلَامَةِ وَالْإِسْلَامِ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma ahillahu 'alaynaa bil-yusri wal-eemaani was-salaamati wal-islaam
duas.translation: O Allah, bring it over us with blessing and faith, and security and Islam.

duas.title: Dua at Breaking Fast
duas.arabic: ذَهَبَ الظَّمَأُ وَابْتَلَتِ الْعُرُوقُ وَثَبَتَ الْأَجْرُ إِنْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ
duas.transliteration: Dha habadh-dhama'u wabtallatil-'urooqu wa thabatal-ajru in shaa'Allaahu
duas.translation: Thirst has gone, the veins are moistened, and the reward is confirmed, if Allah wills.

duas.title: Dua During Thunder
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي يُسَبِّحُ الرَّعْدُ بِحَمْدِهِ وَالْمَلَائِكَةُ مِنْ خِيفَتِهِ
duas.transliteration: Subhaanal-ladhee yusabbihur-ra'du bihamdihi wal-malaa'ikatu min kheefatih
duas.translation: Glory be to Him Whom thunder glorifies with His praise, and so do the angels out of His majesty.

duas.title: Dua When Wind Blows
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَهَا وَخَيْرَ مَا فِيهَا وَخَيْرَ مَا بَعْثْتَ بِهَا
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma innee as-aluka khayrahaa wa khayra maa feehaa wa khayra maa bu'ithta bihaa
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for its good, the good within it, and the good with which You have sent it.

duas.title: Dua at Time of Childbirth
duas.arabic: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي مِنْ لَدُنْكَ ذُرِّيَّةً طَيِّبَةً
duas.transliteration: Rabbi hab lee min ladunka dhurriyyatan tayyibah
duas.translation: My Lord, grant me from Yourself a good offspring.

duas.title: Dua During Hajj Stoning
duas.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَاللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ
duas.transliteration: Bismillaahi wallahu akbar
duas.translation: In the name of Allah, and Allah is the Greatest.

duas.title: Dua at Sa'i Between Safa and Marwah
duas.arabic: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً
duas.transliteration: Rabbanaa aatinaa fid-dunyaa hasanatan wa fil-aakhirati hasanatan
duas.translation: Our Lord, give us in this world [that which is] good and in the Hereafter [that which is] good.

duas.title: Dua During Umrah Tawaf
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ وَلَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَاللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ
duas.transliteration: SubhaanAllaahi wal-hamdu lillahi wa laa ilaaha illAllaahu wallaahu akbar
duas.translation: Glory be to Allah, praise be to Allah, there is no god but Allah, and Allah is the Greatest.

duas.title: Dua at Arafat Mountain
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَفْوَ وَالْعَافِيَةَ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma innee as-alukal-'afwa wal-'aafiyata
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being.

duas.title: Dua During Muzdalifah
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْهُ هَدْيًا مُقْبَلًا
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma ij'alhu haydan muqbalan
duas.translation: O Allah, make it an accepted sacrifice.

duas.title: Dua at Jamarat Stoning
duas.arabic: اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ
duas.transliteration: Allaahu Akbar
duas.translation: Allah is the Greatest.

duas.title: Dua During Farewell Tawaf
duas.arabic: لَبَّيْكَ اللَّهُمَّ لَبَّيْكَ لَبَّيْكَ لَا شَرِيكَ لَكَ لَبَّيْكَ
duas.transliteration: Labbayk Allaahumma labbayk, labbayka laa shareeka laka labbayk
duas.translation: At Your service Allah, at Your service. At Your service, You have no partner, at Your service.

duas.title: Dua When Returning from Hajj
duas.arabic: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ الَّذِي لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ
duas.transliteration: Astaghfirullaahal-ladhee laa ilaaha illaa huwa
duas.translation: I seek forgiveness from Allah, there is none worthy of worship except Him.

duas.title: Dua During Sickness
duas.arabic: أَسْأَلُ اللَّهَ الْعَظِيمَ رَبَّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ أَنْ يَشْفِيَكَ
duas.transliteration: As-alullaahal-'adheema rabbil-'arshil-'adheem an yashfiyak
duas.translation: I ask Allah, the Magnificent, Lord of the magnificent Throne, that He cure you.

duas.title: Dua for Patient
duas.arabic: أَسْأَلُ اللَّهَ الْعَظِيمَ رَبَّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ أَنْ يَشْفِيَكَ
duas.transliteration: As-alullaahal-'adheema rabbil-'arshil-'adheem an yashfiyak
duas.translation: I ask Allah, the Magnificent, Lord of the magnificent Throne, that He cure you.

duas.title: Dua for Healing
duas.arabic: أَذْهِبِ الْبَاسَ رَبَّ النَّاسِ اشْفِ أَنْتَ الشَّافِي لَا شِفَاءَ إِلَّا شِفَاؤُكَ
duas.transliteration: Adhhibil-baasa rabban-naasi ishfi antash-shaafi laa shifaa'a illaa shifaa'uk
duas.translation: Remove the disease, O Lord of the people. You are the Healer. There is no healing but Your healing.

duas.title: Bismika Allahumma amootu wa ahya
duas.arabic: بِاسْمِكَ اللَّهُمَّ أَمُوتُ وَأَحْيَا
duas.transliteration: Bismika Allahumma amootu wa ahya
duas.translation: In Your name O Allah, I die and I live.

duas.title: Alhamdulillahilladhi at'amana wa saqana
duas.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَطْعَمَنَا وَسَقَانَا وَكَفَانَا وَآوَانَا فَكَمْ مِمَّنْ لَا كَافِيَ لَهُ وَلَا مُؤْوِيَ
duas.transliteration: Alhamdulillahil-ladhi at'amana wa saqana wa kafana wa awana, fakam mimman la kafiya lahu wa la mu'wiya
duas.translation: All praise is for Allah who fed us, gave us drink, sufficed us and provided us with shelter.

duas.title: Ayatul Kursi
duas.arabic: اللَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ ۚ لَا تَأْخُذُهُ سِنَةٌ وَلَا نَوْمٌ ۚ لَّهُۥ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ مَن ذَا ٱلَّذِى يَشْفَعُ عِندَهُۥٓ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِهِۦ ۚ يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ ۖ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِشَىْءٍۢ مِّنْ عِلْمِهِۦٓ إِلَّا بِمَا شَآءَ ۚ وَسِعَ كُرْسِيُّهُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ ۖ وَلَا يَـُٔودُهُۥ حِفْظُهُمَا ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَلِىُّ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
duas.transliteration: Allahu la ilaha illa huwa alhayyu alqayyoomu...
duas.translation: Allah! There is no god but He, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence...

duas.title: Last two ayat of Surah Al-Baqarah
duas.arabic: آمَنَ ٱلرَّسُولُ بِمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْهِ مِن رَّبِّهِۦ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ ۚ كُلٌّ ءَامَنَ بِٱللَّهِ وَمَلَٰٓئِكَتِهِۦ وَكُتُبِهِۦ وَرُسُلِهِۦ لَا نُفَرِّقُ بَيْنَ أَحَدٍۢ مِّن رُّسُلِهِۦ ۚ وَقَالُوا۟ سَمِعْنَا وَأَطَعْنَا ۖ غُفْرَانَكَ رَبَّنَا وَإِلَيْكَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ ۝ لَا يُكَلِّفُ ٱللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا ۚ لَهَا مَا كَسَبَتْ وَعَلَيْهَا مَا ٱكْتَسَبَتْ ۗ رَبَّنَا لَا تُؤَاخِذْنَآ إِن نَّسِينَآ أَوْ أَخْطَأْنَا ۚ رَبَّنَا وَلَا تَحْمِلْ عَلَيْنَآ إِصْرًۭا كَمَا حَمَلْتَهُۥ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِنَا ۚ رَبَّنَا وَلَا تُحَمِّلْنَا مَا لَا طَاقَةَ لَنَا بِهِۦ ۖ وَٱعْفُ عَنَّا وَٱغْفِرْ لَنَا وَٱرْحَمْنَآ ۚ أَنتَ مَوْلَىٰنَا فَٱنصُرْنَا عَلَى ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ
duas.transliteration: Aamanar-rasoolu bima unzila ilayhi min rabbihi wal-mu'minoon...
duas.translation: The Messenger has believed in what was revealed to him from his Lord, and [so have] the believers...

duas.title: Surah Al-Ikhlas, Al-Falaq, An-Nas (3 times each)
duas.arabic:
قُلْ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ ۝ ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّمَدُ ۝ لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ ۝ وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُۥ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌۭ

قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْفَلَقِ ۝ مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ ۝ وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ ۝ وَمِن شَرِّ ٱلنَّفَّٰثَٰتِ فِى ٱلْعُقَدِ ۝ وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ

قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلنَّاسِ ۝ مَلِكِ ٱلنَّاسِ ۝ إِلَٰهِ ٱلنَّاسِ ۝ مِن شَرِّ ٱلْوَسْوَاسِ ٱلْخَنَّاسِ ۝ ٱلَّذِى يُوَسْوِسُ فِى صُدُورِ ٱلنَّاسِ ۝ مِنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ
duas.transliteration: Qul huwa Allahu ahad... (3 times each)
duas.translation: Say: He is Allah, the One... (recite each surah 3 times)

duas.title: Blow on palms, recite Mu’awwidhat & wipe body (3 times)
duas.arabic: إِذَا أَوَى أَحَدُكُمْ إِلَى فِرَاشِهِ فَلْيَنْفُخْ عَلَى يَدَيْهِ بِـ (قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ) وَالْمُعَوِّذَتَيْنِ ثَلَاثًا ثُمَّ يَمْسَحْ بِهِمَا جَسَدَهُ مَا اسْتَطَاعَ
duas.transliteration: Idha awa ahadukum ila firashihi falyanfukh 'ala yadayhi...
duas.translation: When you go to bed, blow on your hands, recite the Mu’awwidhat three times and wipe your body as much as possible.

duas.title: Tasbih 33, Tahmid 33, Takbir 34
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ (33) × الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ (33) × اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ (34)
duas.transliteration: SubhanAllah (33) × Alhamdulillah (33) × Allahu Akbar (34)
duas.translation: Glory be to Allah (33 times), Praise be to Allah (33 times), Allah is Greatest (34 times)

duas.title: Protection from punishment of grave & hell
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابِ الْقَبْرِ وَمِنْ عَذَابِ النَّارِ وَمِنْ فِتْنَةِ الْمَحْيَا وَالْمَمَاتِ وَمِنْ فِتْنَةِ الْمَسِيحِ الدَّجَّالِ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min 'adhabi al-qabri wa min 'adhabi an-nar...
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave, from the punishment of Hell-fire, from the trials of life and death, and from the evil of the trial of Dajjal.

duas.title: Last 10 verses of Surah Al-Kahf
duas.arabic: أَمْ حَسِبْتَ أَنَّ أَصْحَابَ الْكَهْفِ وَالرَّقِيمِ كَانُوا مِنْ آيَاتِنَا عَجَبًا...
duas.transliteration: Am hasibta anna ashaba alkahfi war-raqeemi...
duas.translation: Or have you thought that the companions of the cave and the inscription were, among Our signs, a wonder?

duas.title: When unable to sleep
duas.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ سُبْحَانَكَ اللَّهُمَّ وَبِحَمْدِكَ
duas.transliteration: La ilaha illa anta subhanaka Allahumma wa bihamdika
duas.translation: There is no god but You, glory be to You, O Allah, and to You be praise.

duas.title: Dua for forgiveness before sleep
duas.arabic: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ الَّذِي لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيَّ الْقَيُّومَ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَيْهِ
duas.transliteration: Astaghfirullah alladhi la ilaha illa huwal hayyul qayyum wa atubu ilayh
duas.translation: I seek the forgiveness of Allah who alone is worthy of worship, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer, and I turn to Him in repentance.

duas.title: Allahumma qini 'adhabaka yawma tab'athu 'ibadak (3 times)
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ قِنِي عَذَابَكَ يَوْمَ تَبْعَثُ عِبَادَكَ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma qini 'adhabaka yawma tab'athu 'ibadak (3 times)
duas.translation: O Allah, protect me from Your punishment on the day You resurrect Your servants.

duas.title: Recite Surah As-Sajdah
duas.arabic: الم ۝ تَنْزِيلُ الْكِتَابِ لَا رَيْبَ فِيهِ مِنْ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ...
duas.transliteration: Alif Lam Mim. Tanzeelul kitabi la rayba feehi min rabbil 'alamin...
duas.translation: Alif-Lam-Mim. The revelation of the Book in which there is no doubt, from the Lord of the worlds.

duas.title: Recite Surah Al-Mulk (Tabarak)
duas.arabic: تَبَارَكَ الَّذِي بِيَدِهِ الْمُلْكُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
duas.transliteration: Tabarakalladhi biyadihil mulku wa huwa 'ala kulli shay'in qadir
duas.translation: Blessed is He in whose hand is dominion, and He is over all things competent.

duas.title: Dua to sleep on right side
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَسْلَمْتُ نَفْسِي إِلَيْكَ وَوَجَّهْتُ وَجْهِي إِلَيْكَ وَفَوَّضْتُ أَمْرِي إِلَيْكَ وَأَلْجَأْتُ ظَهْرِي إِلَيْكَ رَغْبَةً وَرَهْبَةً إِلَيْكَ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma aslamtu nafsi ilayka wa wajjahtu wajhi ilayka...
duas.translation: O Allah, I submit my soul unto You, and I turn my face towards You...

duas.title: Recite 100 times: SubhanAllah, Alhamdulillah, Allahu Akbar
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ × الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ × اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ (100 times)
duas.transliteration: SubhanAllah × Alhamdulillah × Allahu Akbar (100 times)
duas.translation: Glory be to Allah, Praise be to Allah, Allah is the Greatest

duas.title: Alhamdulillahilladhi ahyana ba'da ma amatana
duas.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَحْيَانَا بَعْدَ مَا أَمَاتَنَا وَإِلَيْهِ النُّشُورُ
duas.transliteration: Alhamdulillahil-ladhi ahyana ba'da ma amatana wa ilayhin-nushur
duas.translation: All praise is for Allah who gave us life after having taken it from us and unto Him is the resurrection.

duas.title: La ilaha illallahu wahdahu la sharika lahu (10 times)
duas.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ يُحْيِي وَيُمِيتُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
duas.transliteration: La ilaha illallahu wahdahu la sharika lahu lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu yuhyi wa yumitu wa huwa 'ala kulli shay'in qadir
duas.translation: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone... (10 times)

duas.title: SubhanAllah wa bihamdihi (100 times)
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ
duas.transliteration: SubhanAllahi wa bihamdihi
duas.translation: Glory and praise be to Allah (100 times)

duas.title: Astaghfirullah wa atubu ilayh (100 times)
duas.arabic: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَيْهِ
duas.transliteration: Astaghfirullah wa atubu ilayh
duas.translation: I seek Allah's forgiveness and turn to Him in repentance (100 times)

duas.title: Dua for goodness of the day
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بِكَ أَصْبَحْنَا وَبِكَ أَمْسَيْنَا وَبِكَ نَحْيَا وَبِكَ نَمُوتُ وَإِلَيْكَ النُّشُورُ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma bika asbahna wa bika amsayna wa bika nahya wa bika namutu wa ilaykan-nushur
duas.translation: O Allah, by Your leave we have reached the morning and by Your leave we have reached the evening...

duas.title: Morning remembrance from Qur'an (Al-Imran 3:190-200)
duas.arabic: إِنَّ فِي خَلْقِ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَاخْتِلَافِ اللَّيْلِ وَالنَّهَارِ لَآيَاتٍ لِأُولِي الْأَلْبَابِ...
duas.transliteration: Inna fee khalqis-samawati wal-ardi wakhtilafil-layli wannahaari...
duas.translation: Indeed, in the creation of the heavens and the earth and the alternation of the night and the day are signs for those of understanding...

duas.title: Dua when seeing a dream you dislike
duas.arabic: أَعُوذُ بِاللَّهِ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيمِ (ثَلَاثًا) وَيَتْفُلُ عَنْ يَسَارِهِ ثَلَاثًا
duas.transliteration: A'udhu billahi minash-shaytanir-rajim (3 times) and spit to left 3 times
duas.translation: I seek refuge in Allah from Satan the accursed (3 times) and spit to the left three times.

duas.title: Dua when seeing a good dream
duas.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي بِنِعْمَتِهِ تَتِمُّ الصَّالِحَاتُ
duas.transliteration: Alhamdulillahilladhi bini'matihi tatimmus-salihat
duas.translation: Praise be to Allah by whose grace good deeds are completed.

duas.title: Recite last 3 verses of Surah Al-Hashr after waking
duas.arabic: هُوَ اللَّهُ الَّذِي لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ عَالِمُ الْغَيْبِ وَالشَّهَادَةِ ۖ هُوَ الرَّحْمَٰنُ الرَّحِيمُ...
duas.transliteration: Huwallahu alladhi la ilaha illa huwa 'alimul-ghaybi wash-shahadati...
duas.translation: He is Allah, other than whom there is no deity, Knower of the unseen and the witnessed...

duas.title: Dua for protection after waking
duas.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
duas.transliteration: La ilaha illallahu wahdahu la sharika lahu lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu wa huwa 'ala kulli shay'in qadir
duas.translation: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone... (100 good deeds)

duas.title: Final dua after waking
duas.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي رَدَّ عَلَيَّ رُوحِي وَعَافَانِي فِي جَسَدِي وَأَذِنَ لِي بِذِكْرِهِ
duas.transliteration: Alhamdulillahil-ladhi radda 'alayya roohi wa 'afani fi jasadi wa adhina li bidhikrih
duas.translation: All praise is for Allah who restored to me my soul, gave me health in my body, and permitted me to remember Him.

duas.title: Recite 10 times: La hawla wa la quwwata illa billah
duas.arabic: لَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ (10 times)
duas.transliteration: La hawla wa la quwwata illa billah (10 times)
duas.translation: There is no might nor power except with Allah (10 times)

duas.title: Dua for parents after waking
duas.arabic: رَبَّنَا اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ يَوْمَ يَقُومُ الْحِسَابُ
duas.transliteration: Rabbana ghfir li wa liwalidayya wa lilmu'mineena yawma yaqoomul-hisab
duas.translation: Our Lord, forgive me and my parents and the believers the Day the account is established.

duas.title: Morning dua for rizq
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اكْفِنِي بِحَلَالِكَ عَنْ حَرَامِكَ وَأَغْنِنِي بِفَضْلِكَ عَمَّنْ سِوَاكَ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma ikfini bihalalika 'an haramika wa aghnini bifadlika 'amman siwak
duas.translation: O Allah, suffice me with what is lawful against what is unlawful, and make me independent by Your grace from anyone besides You.

duas.title: Dua for Acceptance of Deeds
duas.arabic: رَبَّنَا تَقَبَّلْ مِنَّا إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ
duas.translation: Our Lord, accept [this] from us. Indeed You are the Hearing, the Knowing.

duas.title: Supplication for Blessings
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
duas.translation: O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad and upon the family of Muhammad.

duas.title: Dua for Acceptance of Prayer
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْهُدَى وَالتُّقَى وَالْعَفَافَ وَالْغِنَى
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for guidance, piety, chastity, and sufficiency.

duas.title: Dua for New Moon of Ramadan
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَهِلَّهُ عَلَيْنَا بِالْيُسْرِ وَالْإِيمَانِ وَالسَّلَامَةِ وَالْإِسْلَامِ
duas.translation: O Allah, bring it over us with blessing and faith, and security and Islam.

duas.title: Dua at Iftar
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي لَكَ صُمْتُ وَبِكَ آمَنْتُ وَعَلَيْكَ تَوَكَّلْتُ
duas.translation: O Allah, I fasted for You, and I believe in You, and I rely upon You.

duas.title: Dua for Forgiveness in Fasting
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّكَ عَفُوٌّ تُحِبُّ الْعَفْوَ فَاعْفُ عَنِّي
duas.translation: O Allah, You are Forgiving and You love forgiveness, so forgive me.

duas.title: Dua for Sehri
duas.arabic: وَصَلِّ عَلَىٰ مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
duas.translation: And send blessings upon Muhammad and the family of Muhammad.

duas.title: Dua Between Takbir and Recitation
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ جِبْرِيلَ وَمِيكَائِيلَ وَإِسْرَافِيلَ فَاطِرَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ عَالِمَ الْغَيْبِ وَالشَّهَادَةِ
duas.translation: O Allah, Lord of Jibra-eel, Meeka-eel and Israfeel (great angels), Creator of the heavens and the Earth, Knower of the seen and the unseen. You are the arbitrator between Your servants in that which they have disputed. Guide me to the truth by Your leave, in that which they have differed, for verily You guide whom You will to a straight path.

duas.title: Dua at Beginning of Night Prayer
duas.arabic: وَجَّهْتُ وَجْهِيَ لِلَّذِي فَطَرَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ حَنِيفًا وَمَا أَنَا مِنَ الْمُشْرِكِينَ
duas.translation: I have turned my face sincerely towards He who has brought forth the heavens and the Earth and I am not of those who associate (others with Allah). Indeed my prayer, my sacrifice, my life and my death are for Allah, Lord of the worlds, no partner has He, with this I am commanded and I am of the Muslims.

duas.title: Dua in Sujood
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ رَبِّيَ الْأَعْلَى
duas.translation: Glory be to my Lord Most High.

duas.title: Dua After Ruku
duas.arabic: سَمِعَ اللَّهُ لِمَنْ حَمِدَهُ
duas.translation: Allah hears those who praise Him.

duas.title: Dua at Beginning of Tahajjud
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَكَ اللَّهُمَّ وَبِحَمْدِكَ
duas.translation: Glory is to You O Allah, and praise. Blessed is Your Name and Exalted is Your Majesty.

duas.title: Dua in Witr Prayer
duas.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ
duas.translation: There is none worthy of worship but Allah.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Dajjal
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ فِتْنَةِ الْمَسِيحِ الدَّجَّالِ
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the trials of the False Messiah (Dajjal).

duas.title: Dua for Qunut in Witr
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اهْدِنِي فِيمَنْ هَدَيْتَ وَعَافِنِي فِيمَنْ عَافَيْتَ
duas.translation: O Allah, guide me among those whom You have guided, pardon me among those whom You have pardoned.

duas.title: Morning Remembrance
duas.arabic: أَصْبَحْنَا وَأَصْبَحَ الْمُلْكُ لِلَّهِ
duas.translation: We have reached the morning and at this very time unto Allah belongs all sovereignty.

duas.title: Dua for Protection in Morning
duas.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الَّذِي لَا يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٌ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِي السَّمَاءِ
duas.translation: In the name of Allah with whose name nothing can harm on earth or in heaven.

duas.title: Evening Remembrance
duas.arabic: أَمْسَيْنَا وَأَمْسَى الْمُلْكُ لِلَّهِ
duas.translation: We have reached the evening and at this very time unto Allah belongs all sovereignty.

duas.title: Dua for Protection in Evening
duas.arabic: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
duas.translation: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.

duas.title: Talbiyah
duas.arabic: لَبَّيْكَ اللَّهُمَّ لَبَّيْكَ لَبَّيْكَ لَا شَرِيكَ لَكَ لَبَّيْكَ إِنَّ الْحَمْدَ وَالنِّعْمَةَ لَكَ وَالْمُلْكَ
duas.translation: At Your service Allah, at Your service. At Your service, You have no partner, at Your service. Indeed praise, grace, and dominion belong to You.

duas.title: Dua at Arafat
duas.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ يُحْيِي وَيُمِيتُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
duas.translation: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. His is the dominion and His is the praise. He gives life and causes death, and He is Able to do all things.

duas.title: Dua for Healing
duas.arabic: أَذْهِبِ الْبَاسَ رَبَّ النَّاسِ اشْفِ أَنْتَ الشَّافِي لَا شِفَاءَ إِلَّا شِفَاؤُكَ شِفَاءً لَا يُغَادِرُ سَقَمًا
duas.translation: Remove the disease, O Lord of the people. You are the Healer. There is no healing but Your healing, a healing that leaves no ailment.

duas.title: Dua for Pain
duas.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ (ثَلَاثَ مَرَّاتِ) أَعُوذُ بِعِزَّةِ اللَّهِ وَقُدْرَتِهِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا أَجِدُ وَأُحَاذِرُ (سَبْعَ مَرَّاتِ)
duas.translation: In the name of Allah (three times). I seek refuge in the might and power of Allah from the evil of what I find and what I fear (seven times).

duas.title: Ayat al-Kursi
duas.arabic: اللَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ لَا تَأْخُذُهُ سِنَةٌ وَلَا نَوْمٌ لَهُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ مَنْ ذَا الَّذِي يَشْفَعُ عِنْدَهُ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِهِ يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِشَيْءٍ مِنْ عِلْمِهِ إِلَّا بِمَا شَاءَ وَسِعَ كُرْسِيُّهُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ وَلَا يَئُودُهُ حِفْظُهُمَا وَهُوَ الْعَلِيُّ الْعَظِيمُ
duas.translation: Allah - there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of [all] existence. Neither drowsiness overtakes Him nor sleep. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Who is it that can intercede with Him except by His permission? He knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them, and they encompass not a thing of His knowledge except for what He wills. His Kursi extends over the heavens and the earth, and their preservation tires Him not. And He is the Most High, the Most Great.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Jinn
duas.arabic: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّةِ مِنْ غَضَبِهِ وَعِقَابِهِ وَشَرِّ عِبَادِهِ وَمِنْ هَمَزَاتِ الشَّيَاطِينِ وَأَنْ يَحْضُرُونِ
duas.translation: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from His anger and punishment, and from the evil of His servants, and from the evil suggestions of the devils and from their presence.

duas.title: Dua for Righteous Children
duas.arabic: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي مِنْ لَدُنْكَ ذُرِّيَّةً طَيِّبَةً إِنَّكَ سَمِيعُ الدُّعَاءِ
duas.translation: My Lord, grant me from Yourself a good offspring. Indeed, You are the Hearer of supplication.

duas.title: Dua for Protection of Children
duas.arabic: وَاجْعَلْنَا مُسْلِمَيْنِ لَكَ وَمِنْ ذُرِّيَّتِنَا أُمَّةً مُسْلِمَةً لَكَ
duas.translation: And make us Muslims [in submission] to You and from our descendants a Muslim nation [in submission] to You.

duas.title: Dua for Pious Spouse
duas.arabic: رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَاجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّاتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍ وَاجْعَلْنَا لِلْمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا
duas.translation: Our Lord, grant us from among our wives and offspring comfort to our eyes and make us an example for the righteous.

duas.title: Dua for Nikah
duas.arabic: بَارِكْ لِي فِي أَهْلِي وَمَالِي
duas.translation: Bless me in my family and my property.

duas.title: Dua for Easy Delivery
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ لَدُنْكَ الْعَفْوُ وَالْعَافِيَةُ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ
duas.translation: O Allah, with You is forgiveness and well-being in this world and the Hereafter.

duas.title: Dua for Healthy Baby
duas.arabic: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي مِنْ لَدُنْكَ ذُرِّيَّةً طَيِّبَةً
duas.translation: My Lord, grant me from Yourself a good offspring.

duas.title: Dua for Safe Travel
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَٰذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لَهُ مُقْرِنِينَ وَإِنَّا إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا لَمُنْقَلِبُونَ
duas.translation: Glory to Him who has subjected this to us, and we could never have it by our efforts. And indeed, to our Lord we will return.

duas.title: Dua when Leaving Home
duas.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى اللَّهِ لَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ
duas.translation: In the name of Allah. I place my trust in Allah. There is no might or power except with Allah.

duas.title: Dua for Rain
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ صَيِّبْ عَلَيْنَا الْغَيْثَ وَانْفَعْنَا بِهِ
duas.translation: O Allah, send down upon us rain and make it beneficial for us.

duas.title: Dua to Stop Rain
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ حَوَالَيْنَا وَلَا عَلَيْنَا
duas.translation: O Allah, around us and not upon us.

duas.title: Dua Entering Mosque
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ افْتَحْ لِي أَبْوَابَ رَحْمَتِكَ
duas.translation: O Allah, open the gates of Your mercy for me.

duas.title: Dua Leaving Mosque
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You from Your bounty.

duas.title: Dua Entering Home
duas.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَلَجْنَا وَبِسْمِ اللَّهِ خَرَجْنَا وَعَلَى رَبِّنَا تَوَكَّلْنَا
duas.translation: In the name of Allah we enter, and in the name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we rely.

duas.title: Dua Entering Market
duas.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ يُحْيِي وَيُمِيتُ وَهُوَ حَيٌّ لَا يَمُوتُ بِيَدِهِ الْخَيْرُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
duas.translation: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. His is the dominion and His is the praise. He gives life and causes death, and He is living and does not die. In His Hand is all good and He is Able to do all things.

duas.title: Dua Before Sleeping
duas.arabic: بِاسْمِكَ اللَّهُمَّ أَمُوتُ وَأَحْيَا
duas.translation: In Your name, O Allah, I die and I live.

duas.title: Dua for Protection in Sleep
duas.arabic: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ غَضَبِهِ وَعِقَابِهِ
duas.translation: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from His anger and punishment.

duas.title: Dua Upon Waking
duas.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَحْيَانَا بَعْدَ مَا أَمَاتَنَا وَإِلَيْهِ النُّشُورُ
duas.translation: Praise is to Allah who gave us life after having taken it from us and unto Him is the resurrection.

duas.title: Dua Entering Toilet
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْخُبْثِ وَالْخَبَائِثِ
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from male and female devils.

duas.title: Dua Leaving Toilet
duas.arabic: غُفْرَانَكَ
duas.translation: I seek Your forgiveness.

duas.title: Dua Wearing New Clothes
duas.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي كَسَانِي هَذَا وَرَزَقَنِيهِ مِنْ غَيْرِ حَوْلٍ مِنِّي وَلَا قُوَّةٍ
duas.translation: Praise is to Allah who clothed me with this and provided it for me without any might nor power from myself.

duas.title: Dua Before Eating
duas.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ
duas.translation: In the name of Allah.

duas.title: Dua After Eating
duas.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَطْعَمَنِي هَذَا وَرَزَقَنِيهِ مِنْ غَيْرِ حَوْلٍ مِنِّي وَلَا قُوَّةٍ
duas.translation: Praise is to Allah who fed me this and provided it for me without any might nor power from myself.

duas.title: Dua Before Drinking
duas.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ
duas.translation: In the name of Allah.

duas.title: Dua After Drinking
duas.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَسْقَانِي هَذَا وَرَزَقَنِيهِ مِنْ غَيْرِ حَوْلٍ مِنِّي وَلَا قُوَّةٍ
duas.translation: Praise is to Allah who gave me this drink and provided it for me without any might nor power from myself.

duas.title: Dua After Adhan
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ هَذِهِ الدَّعْوَةِ التَّامَّةِ وَالصَّلَاةِ الْقَائِمَةِ آتِ مُحَمَّدًا الْوَسِيلَةَ وَالْفَضِيلَةَ وَابْعَثْهُ مَقَامًا مَحْمُودًا الَّذِي وَعَدْتَهُ
duas.translation: O Allah, Lord of this perfect call and established prayer. Grant Prophet Muhammad the intercession and the virtue, and raise him to the praised station that You have promised him.

duas.title: Dua for Success in Exam
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ لَا سَهْلَ إِلَّا مَا جَعَلْتَهُ سَهْلًا وَأَنْتَ تَجْعَلُ الْحَزْنَ إِذَا شِئْتَ سَهْلًا
duas.translation: O Allah, there is no ease except in that which You have made easy, and You make the difficult, if You wish, easy.

duas.title: Dua for Success in Interview
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَافِيَةَ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for well-being in this world and the Hereafter.

duas.title: Dua for Safe Driving
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَٰذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لَهُ مُقْرِنِينَ
duas.translation: Glory to Him who has subjected this to us, and we could never have it by our efforts.

duas.title: Dua After Sneezing
duas.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ
duas.translation: Praise be to Allah.

duas.title: Response to Sneeze
duas.arabic: يَرْحَمُكَ اللَّهُ
duas.translation: May Allah have mercy on you.

duas.title: Dua for Yawning
duas.arabic: أَعُوذُ بِاللَّهِ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيمِ
duas.translation: I seek refuge in Allah from Satan, the accursed.

duas.title: Dua for Seeing Off
duas.arabic: زَوَّدْنَا مِنْ قِبَلِكَ رَحْمَةً إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الْوَهَّابُ
duas.translation: Provide for us from Your presence mercy. Indeed You are the Bestower.

duas.title: Dua in Distress
duas.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ سُبْحَانَكَ إِنِّي كُنْتُ مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ
duas.translation: There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers.

duas.title: Dua for Relief from Difficulty
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ رَحْمَتَكَ أَرْجُو فَلَا تَكِلْنِي إِلَى نَفْسِي طَرْفَةَ عَيْنٍ
duas.translation: O Allah, I hope for Your mercy, so do not leave me to myself even for the blink of an eye.

duas.title: Sayyidul Istighfar
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّي لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ خَلَقْتَنِي وَأَنَا عَبْدُكَ وَأَنَا عَلَىٰ عَهْدِكَ وَوَعْدِكَ مَا اسْتَطَعْتُ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا صَنَعْتُ أَبُوءُ لَكَ بِنِعْمَتِكَ عَلَيَّ وَأَبُوءُ بِذَنْبِي فَاغْفِرْ لِي فَإِنَّهُ لَا يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوبَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ
duas.translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, none has the right to be worshipped except You, You created me and I am Your servant and I abide to Your covenant and promise as best I can. I take refuge in You from the evil of what I have created. I acknowledge Your favour upon me and I acknowledge my sin, so forgive me, for verily none can forgive sin except You.

duas.title: Dua for Forgiveness
duas.arabic: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ الَّذِي لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَيْهِ
duas.translation: I seek forgiveness from Allah, there is none worthy of worship except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer, and I repent to Him.

duas.title: Dua for Guidance
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اهْدِنِي وَسَدِّدْنِي
duas.translation: O Allah, guide me and keep me straight.

duas.title: Dua for Right Path
duas.arabic: اهْدِنَا الصِّرَاطَ الْمُسْتَقِيمَ
duas.translation: Guide us to the straight path.

duas.title: Dua Entering City
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِيْهَا
duas.translation: O Allah, bless us in it.

duas.title: Dua Leaving City
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِيْمَا بَرَكْتَ
duas.translation: O Allah, bless us in what You have blessed.

duas.title: Dua Boarding Plane
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَٰذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لَهُ مُقْرِنِينَ
duas.translation: Glory to Him who has subjected this to us, and we could never have it by our efforts.

duas.title: Dua in Sea Distress
duas.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ سُبْحَانَكَ إِنِّي كُنْتُ مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ
duas.translation: There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Fear
duas.arabic: حَسْبِيَ اللَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ وَهُوَ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ
duas.translation: Sufficient for me is Allah; there is no deity except Him. On Him I have relied, and He is the Lord of the Great Throne.

duas.title: Dua for Paying Debt
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ مَالِكَ الْمُلْكِ تُؤْتِي الْمُلْكَ مَنْ تَشَاءُ وَتَنْزِعُ الْمُلْكَ مِمَّنْ تَشَاءُ
duas.translation: O Allah, Owner of Sovereignty, You give sovereignty to whom You will and You take sovereignty away from whom You will.

duas.title: Dua Against Enemies
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ مُنْزِلَ الْكِتَابِ سَرِيعَ الْحِسَابِ اهْزِمِ الْأَحْزَابَ
duas.translation: O Allah, Revealer of the Book, Swift Reckoner, defeat the parties.

duas.title: Dua from Oppression
duas.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ سُبْحَانَكَ إِنِّي كُنْتُ مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ
duas.translation: There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers.

duas.title: Dua for Repentance
duas.arabic: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَيْهِ
duas.translation: I seek forgiveness from Allah and repent to Him.

duas.title: Dua of Thanks
duas.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ حَمْدًا كَثِيرًا طَيِّبًا مُبَارَكًا فِيهِ
duas.translation: Praise is to Allah, much praise, good and blessed praise.

duas.title: Dua for Beneficial Knowledge
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ انْفَعْنِي بِمَا عَلَّمْتَنِي وَعَلِّمْنِي مَا يَنْفَعُنِي
duas.translation: O Allah, benefit me through that which You have taught me and teach me that which will benefit me.

duas.title: Dua After Reciting Quran
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْهُ لِي إِمَانًا بَاهِرًا وَرَحْمَةً وَاسِعَةً
duas.translation: O Allah, make it for me a light, a reminder, guidance, and mercy.

duas.title: Subhanallah
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ
duas.translation: Glory be to Allah.

duas.title: Alhamdulillah
duas.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ
duas.translation: Praise be to Allah.

duas.title: Allahu Akbar
duas.arabic: اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ
duas.translation: Allah is the Greatest.

duas.title: La ilaha illallah
duas.arabic: لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ
duas.translation: There is no god but Allah.

duas.title: Dua Entering Graveyard
duas.arabic: السَّلَامُ عَلَيْكُمْ أَهْلَ الدِّيَارِ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُسْلِمِينَ
duas.translation: Peace be upon you, O inhabitants of the graves, believers and Muslims.

duas.title: Dua for Deceased
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لَهُ وَارْحَمْهُ وَعَافِهِ وَاعْفُ عَنْهُ
duas.translation: O Allah, forgive him and have mercy on him, keep him safe and sound and forgive him.

duas.title: Dua for Jannah
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْجَنَّةَ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ النَّارِ
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for Paradise and I seek refuge in You from the Fire.

duas.title: Dua at Gate of Paradise
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ سَلَّمْ سَلَامًا كَافِيَةً
duas.translation: O Allah, grant safety, a safety that suffices.

duas.title: Dua at Deathbed
duas.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ
duas.translation: There is no god but Allah.
